content.query:
--- Cancelled Orders Starting with C
----DROP VIEW  vw_CancelledOrders
CREATE VIEW vw_CancelledOrders AS
SELECT 
    F.InvoiceNo,
    COUNT(DISTINCT F.InvoiceNo) AS Cancelled_Order,
    SUM(
        CASE 
            WHEN (F.Quantity * F.UnitPrice) > 0 THEN -1 * (F.Quantity * F.UnitPrice)
            ELSE F.Quantity * F.UnitPrice
        END
    ) AS CancelledRevenue
FROM GoldFact_Sales AS F
WHERE F.InvoiceNo LIKE 'C%'
GROUP BY F.InvoiceNo;
